lilith.title: Lilith's Awakening
lilith.synopsis: "Lilith's Awakening"  is a erotic horror film written, directed and produced by Gabriela Voll, about a young woman who begins to experience weird phenomena which results in the possession of her body by a dark unknown force. The only thing that is certain is that no man is safe.
lilith.blurb: A young woman, possessed by an evil force goes on a rampage. There are worse ways to die, I suppose.
lilith.tags: Lilith's Awakening, liliths awakening, lilith, awakening, horror movie, horror, horror short, art house, blood, bloodfest, halloween, dark romance, demon, succubus, maneater, porn, arthouse porn
